overview: Andy Frizzell joined Aria Systems in 2008 as the Vice President of Customer Operations. Andy is responsible for all customers and partners in the areas of solution creation, implementation, training, and support. Andy has over 15 years of professional services experience with CSG Systems, Portal Software, Datasweep and Bricsnet, managing and supporting enterprise software solutions nationally and internationally. Andy has a Bachelor of Arts in Humanities from The University of Texas at Austin.
